body:
Though nexus isn't very played anymore, i still want to ask where all the maps that are no longer in rotation went like all of the Travincal maps, all of the maps with 4 teams, Amazon II, Edron, etc

I was unsure what category to put this in so i put it in map releases
body_tagged:

title: What happened to all the nexus maps?

replies.body:
This thread should help answer your question:

https://avicus.net/forums/bb441067e

Also moved to Avicus Lounge. ^-^

replies.body: Thanks, sad to see good maps removed for "No Comment" though none of the 4 team maps are on that list
replies.body_tagged: Thanks, sad to see good maps removed for "No Comment" though none of the 4 team maps are on that list

replies.body: Travincal I & II are still in the rots. Only III got removed because it was too confusing (my bad) xD
replies.body_tagged: Travincal I & II are still in the rots. Only III got removed because it was too confusing (my bad) xD

replies.body: Well that's only on Nexus01, on Nexus02 & Nexus03 the maps are still playable :D
